name: ServerDonations
short: Donate bot currencies or other things to servers.
description: Base commands to donate to server giveaways, events, heists etc.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data.
install_msg: Thank you for installing ServerDonations. Load the cog with `[p]load serverdonations`.
